results.title: Neuroprotective effects of metformin on traumatic brain injury in rats is associated with the AMP-activated protein kinase signaling pathway.
results.text_hl: This study suggests that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ inhibits @DISEASE_Brain_Injuries_Traumatic @DISEASE_MESH:D000070642 @@@TBI@@@-mediated @<m>DISEASE_Compassion_Fatigue</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000068376 @@@secondary injury@@@ via phosphorylation of @GENE_PRKAA2 @GENE_78975 @@@AMPK@@@ and improves neurobehavioral function following @DISEASE_Brain_Injuries_Traumatic @DISEASE_MESH:D000070642 @@@TBI@@@, which provides a potential therapeutic opportunity in the treatment of @DISEASE_Brain_Injuries_Traumatic @DISEASE_MESH:D000070642 @@@TBI@@@.
